definition: the real physical matter of which a person or thing consists
details:
noun
- the real physical matter of which a person or thing consists
= example: the real physical matter of which a person or thing consists
- a particular kind or species of matter with uniform properties
= example: a particular kind or species of matter with uniform properties
- the idea that is intended
= synonyms: meaning
- the choicest or most essential or most vital part of some idea or experience
= synonyms: heart and soul, core, heart, essence, sum, inwardness, marrow, pith, nitty-gritty, kernel, gist, meat, nub
- what a communication that is about something is about
= synonyms: content, message, subject matter
- considerable capital (wealth or income)
= synonyms: means
- material of a particular kind or constitution
= example: material of a particular kind or constitution
